full_summary:
#Pack and Harness Assy Tender Announcement

**Tender Reference**: ###CB-9222-94678922###


**Solicitation Title**: Supply Arrangement - W8485-184741 Series - Aviation Replacement Parts


##Project Overview##


The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a supplier to provide 400 items for the CT114 under the Supply Arrangement (SA) W8485-184741 Series. The eligible suppliers are the pre-qualified firms listed below who have been invited to submit a proposal.

*   Aero Precision Industries LLC
*   Aero Technical Components Inc.
*   Simex Defence Inc.
*   JHT Defense Inc.
*   Tower Aerospace Inc.
*   Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited
*   Unisource Technology Inc.
*   L3 Technologies MAS Inc.
*   M1 Composites Technology
*   Rockwell Collins Canada

##Request for Proposal Guidelines##


Qualifying SA Holders will be invited to submit a proposal via a Request for Proposal (RFP) directly sent by the Contracting Officer. However, the Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for distributing the RFP documents.

##Contracting Officer Contact Information##


Any inquiries regarding the RFP should be addressed to:

Ryan Duncan, Contracting Officer
Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
Department of National Defence (DND) / Government of Canada
455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7
Phone: (613) 292-9650
Email: [ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca](mailto:ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca)

##Supply Arrangement Authority Contact Information##


A notice will be posted on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at least once a year to allow more contractors to become qualified for the Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series.

To become qualified, please contact:

Jessica Lepinski, Supply Team Leader
Government of Canada | Public Services and Procurement Canada
Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector
Civilian Aircraft Division - CAG
Email: [jessica.lepinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.lepinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

The deadline for the tender closing is **2023-09-26T14:00:00**. The procurement method used is competitive, with selective tendering.

Notice
